## Creating maps displaying prevision and skill shapefiles

Using tmap package

```{r}
titre_prev <- "gngn"
 
### STATIC MAP
tmap_mode('plot')
qtm(shp_wilcox, fill = "wilcoxon", style = "beaver", legend.outside=TRUE, legend.outside.position = "bottom", legend.stack = "horizontal", legend.frame=TRUE, attr.outside = TRUE, legend.title.size = 0.8, legend.text.size = 0.5, basemaps = franceMapEnv)+
  qtm(shp_tercile, fill = "tercile")+
  tm_grid(y=c(43.487, 43.787), x=c(4,03,4.5,5),  labels.inside.frame = FALSE, alpha = 0, labels.rot = c(0,90))+
  tm_scale_bar()+
  tm_layout(franceMapEnv)

#interactive map
tmap_mode('view')
qtm(shp_wilcox, fill = "wilcoxon", style = "beaver", legend.outside=TRUE, legend.outside.position = "bottom", legend.stack = "horizontal", legend.frame=TRUE, attr.outside = TRUE, legend.title.size = 0.8, legend.text.size = 0)+
  qtm(shp_tercile, fill = "tercile", alpha = 0)+
  tm_scale_bar()+
  tm_layout(franceMapEnv)

```
